jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Collects, organizes, and interprets data to help teams make informed decisions. Uses tools like Python, Excel, or SQL to find patterns and present insights visually.

jobs.title: Junior UI Designer
jobs.description: Designs intuitive user interfaces that align with brand style guides. Works with developers to ensure layouts and visual elements are consistent and user-friendly.

jobs.title: Junior UX Designer
jobs.description: Assists in researching user needs and testing design prototypes. Helps create smooth user experiences by improving usability and accessibility.

jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description: Assists in developing and maintaining websites or web apps. Works on front-end features, debugging, and small-scale projects under supervision.

jobs.title: Front-End Web Developer
jobs.description: Builds and styles websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Focuses on responsive design and interactive user interfaces.

jobs.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Works on both front-end and back-end website features. Uses JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and basic server-side technologies like Node.js.
